collection:
The app
will read page data you give access to when you sign in via Google OAuth.

In addition, user profile data like name and
email is requested to create an account and authorise you with eesel.

We strictly adhere to GDPR guidelines, collecting and processing data only
when necessary, never transferring or selling user data.
sharing:
When a request
is made, the app uses the embeddings to find related pages and conversations,
and shares only specific relevant snippets with [OpenAI](https://openai.com/)
to generate the response.

Data shared with OpenAI is retained for abuse and misuse
monitoring for a maximum of 30 days, and then it is deleted.
Google user data like name and email is never shared with any party.

Likewise, any access to your
page data you provide (like your Google Docs, Slides or Sheets) is never
shared with anyone.

We strictly adhere to GDPR guidelines, collecting and processing data only
when necessary, never transferring or selling user data.
